data.title: BMRCL Recruitment 2024 Apply for latest Bengaluru Metro Rail Corporation Limited Job Notification
data.meta_description: BMRCL Recruitment 2024 Apply for BMRCL vacancies through the official website bmrc.co.in, Check Latest Bengaluru Metro Rail Corporation Limited (BMRCL) Job notifications & apply for active Jobs Now
data.text:
About BMRCL

ಬೆಂಗಳೂರು ಮೆಟ್ರೊ ರೈಲ್ ಕಾರ್ಪೋರೇಷನ್ ಲಿಮಿಟೆಡ್ ನೇಮಕಾತಿ 2023-24: Bengaluru Metro Rail Corporation Limited is joint venture of Government of India and Government of Karnataka. This is special purpose project of entrusted along with responsibility of implementation and operation of Bangalore Metro rail project. Bengaluru metro is also called as Namma Metro.

BMRCL Career
